#Setup directory paths
SET(ROOT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
SET(FFTREAL ${ROOT}/fftreal)
SET(ECHONEST ${ROOT}/echonest)
SET(DLFCN ${ROOT}/dlfcn)
SET(QPLOTTING ${ROOT}/qplotting)
SET(QWT ${ROOT}/qwt)

#Initiate sub-directories
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${FFTREAL})
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${ECHONEST})
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${QPLOTTING})
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${QWT})
IF(WIN32)
	ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${DLFCN})
ENDIF()
